content: But I will always be honest with you about the challenges we face. I will listen to you, especially when we disagree. And above all, I will ask you to join in the work of remaking this nation, the only way it's been done in America for 221 years; block by block, brick by brick, calloused hand by calloused hand.
translations: ita:Ma io sarò sempre sincero con voi riguardo alle sfide che abbiamo di fronte. Vi ascolterò, specialmente quando saremo in
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by pllim (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
